name: Soul Story
description:
!!! There are some bugs that I am aware of, so if I come back to this project I will work on them !!!

This is an Undertale Fan Game that I may or may not continue to work on

I made mostly all the assets on my own, except for the music. Credit goes to Toby Fox and a few other people (Who unfortunately I cant remember where I got the 8-bit versions of the songs)
